mapper.select: SELECT product.pid AS pid, product_name_kor, product_name_eng, product_id, category_id, gender_id, brand.brand_name AS brand_name, released_price, created_at, product_likes, product_bookmark, GROUP_CONCAT(product_img.img_file) AS img_file FROM product INNER JOIN product_img ON product.pid = product_img.pid INNER JOIN brand ON product.brand_id = brand.brand_id WHERE product.pid = #{pid} GROUP BY product.pid;

SELECT product.*, brand.brand_name, product_img.img_file, category.category_name_eng FROM product LEFT JOIN brand ON product.brand_id = brand.brand_id LEFT JOIN product_img ON product.pid = product_img.pid LEFT JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id WHERE product_img.img_file LIKE '%-1%' order by product.pid asc limit #{startNum}, #{endNum};
select product_size, pid, bidding_id, MIN(bidding_price) AS bidding_price from biddings where pid=#{pid} and status="입찰중" GROUP BY product_size ORDER BY product_size ASC;
